title: Riding The Boss - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Comedy   Drama   Josei   Mature   Romance
tags: Adultery   Affair   Betrayal   Broken Engagement   Business Management   Cheats   Clingy Lover   Contracts   Cunning Protagonist   Enemies Become Lovers   Female Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Love at First Sight   Marriage   Reincarnation   Revenge   Trap   Unconditional Love
author: Miss Lau   刘大小姐
description:
She had done everything to help her fiance start the business. Unfortunately, she was betrayed by the jerk and the mistress.

After jumping from her apartment, she was reborn...

During this particular lifetime, she swore she won't attack others unless she was attacked. If she was attacked, she must remove out the source of trouble...

So she started a perfect plan to revenge them. However, she became the prey of a man...

They were tacit business partners in public, courteous and backscratching.

In private, he held her in arms, 'Your success depends on me. It's time for you to repay me!'

'Hey! No! You can't take off my clothes!'

'I'm your boss, why not? '...>
